name: Witches' Legacy: Lair of the Witch Queen Collector's Edition
description: A letter offers new information about Elizabeth just as Lynn's powers have awakened. Help her overcome the darkness before it's too late!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 1314 MB available space
